name: POIJU.IO
tagline: POIJU.IO - plotter server for online or boat computer use
body: # POIJU.IO Welcome to POIJU.IO developer documentation. POIJU.IO is a free to use open source service for nautical charts for Finland sea and lake areas. ## Want to use POIJU.IO? Go to [www.poiju.io](https://www.poiju.io) using a browser of your choice on laptop, desktop, mobile device or tablet. Remember to allow location services on your device. POIJU.IO is also available [on iOS AppStore](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/poiju.io/id1131231829?mt=8). Please follow POIJU.IO development and join the discussion in social media: [](https://www.facebook.com/poiju.io/) [](blog.poiju.io) [](https://www.twitter.com/poijuio/) [](https://www.instagram.com/poijuio/) ## Want to know how POIJU.IO is done and start developing yourself? POIJU.IO is open source project and available on GitHub. Want to add new features? Do you have an awesome idea similar to POIJU.IO - for example an app for outdoor people? Now you can do it! POIJU.IO was developed from idea to launch with $30 and in less than 50 hours so there is no complex magic inside and anyone with some coding experience can get started with these instructions. ### Setting up local environment: To get started clone POIJU.IO repository: `git clone https://github.com/iaue/poiju.io.git` For running POIJU.IO locally NODEJS, NPM and BOWER are required. More information: https://docs.npmjs.com/getting-started/installing-node Go to POIJU.IO directory and run following commands: `npm install` `bower install` These commands will install all the POIJU.IO server and front end dependencies. ### Running POIJU.IO locally: To start POIJU.IO server locally type in following command: `nodejs start` This will start POIJU.IO server on your computer. Open browser and go to `https://localhost:5555`. For http version use `http://localhost:5000` ### Start developing (aka this is where the magic happens) POIJU.IO service is pretty much a result of all the great open source and freemium stuff available on Internet. Here are some services and components I have been using when creating the service: Add to home screen: http://cubiq.org/add-to-home-screen Loading spinner: http://spin.js.org/ Map tiles: https://www.mapbox.com/mapbox-gl-js/api/ Tile caching: https://www.npmjs.com/package/tiny-cache Tile cache hashing: https://www.npmjs.com/package/js-md5 Application favicons: http://realfavicongenerator.net/ SSL signing: https://www.cloudflare.com/ Heroku SSL redirect: https://www.npmjs.com/package/heroku-ssl-redirect Mobile app icons: https://makeappicon.com Mobile app launch screen images: Asset Catalog Creator http://www.bridgetech.io/ *** More detailed tutorials coming soon! ### Feedback? Do you love POIJU.IO? Maybe you have some development suggestions? Please leave [feedback!](https://go.taplause.com/BkyuTguL)
